This file contains a "review kit" to be shared in vote emails, see
`generate-email.sh`. Note that these instructions are used by other
Apache Logging Services projects besides `logging-parent`. Hence, they
should work universally for all projects using
`workflows/deploy-release-reusable.yaml`.

-----8<-----~( cut here )~-----8<-----
# Check out the distribution
svn co @PROJECT_DIST_URL@ @PROJECT_ID@-@PROJECT_VERSION@-@COMMIT_ID@ && cd $_

# Verify checksums
sha512sum --check *.sha512

# Verify signatures
wget -O - https://downloads.apache.org/logging/KEYS | gpg --import
for sigFile in *.asc; do gpg --verify $sigFile; done

# Extract the sources
umask 0022
unzip *-src.zip -d src
cd src

# [Linux/macOS] Verify the build and its reproducibility
export NEXUS_REPO=https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/orgapachelogging-<CHECK>
sh mvnw -Prelease verify artifact:compare -Dreference.repo=$NEXUS_REPO

# [Windows] Verify the build
sh mvnw verify
